entry.content: VEGAN MAYO🌱 This vegan Mayo is 100% foolproof, made in 2mins and tastes better than the store bought mayo.🤗 And you can customize it by adding different spices.🤓 RECIPE (2 jars, 2min prep time): -water of a can of chickpeas (about 1/2cup {125ml}) -1 Tbsp

entry.title: STOVE TOP APPLE CAKE 🍰 Making a cake without an oven? Yep, it works and it’s super delicious! 😋 RECIPE (23cm diameter nonstick pan): -90g flour -10g corn starch -50g sugar Stir -1 Tsp baking powder -30g oil -85ml plant milk -a squeeze of lemon -cinnamon
entry.content: STOVE TOP APPLE CAKE 🍰 Making a cake without an oven? Yep, it works and it’s super delicious! 😋 RECIPE (23cm diameter nonstick pan): -90g flour -10g corn starch -50g sugar Stir -1 Tsp baking powder -30g oil -85ml plant milk -a squeeze of lemon -cinnamon

entry.title: MEATLESS MEATBALLS 🔥 If you don’t know how to flavor your tofu right… try this recipe!😌 🥶The meat(less)balls can be stored after baking in the freezer up to 3 months. RECIPE (3 servings, 25min prep time): -1 block (200g) firm tofu, crumbled -1 small, fine
